context_bundle.summary: TCP localhost debugging for IPC issues. Diagnose stuck connections, port pollution, and services causing localhost deadlocks (e.g., IncrediBuild blocking Battle.net).

onboarding.quick_start: Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalAddress 127.0.0.1 | Group-Object State | identify Closing/FinWait2 buildup
common_patterns: # Check localhost health: Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalAddress 127.0.0.1 | Group-Object State
# Listening ports: Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalAddress 127.0.0.1 -State Listen | Select LocalPort, OwningProcess
known_errors: IncrediBuild CoordinatorService on port 31100 causes connection leaks
Hyper-V vSwitch routes ALL traffic including localhost through virtual stack
Stuck Closing/FinWait2 connections timeout in 60-120 seconds after killing owner process
